title: Function Composition in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of function composition in JavaScript. We will learn how to combine multiple functions to create a new function, and how to use the compose() function to perform right-to-left function composition. Through hands-on examples and exercises, we will gain a deeper understanding of this powerful technique and its practical applications in programming.

meta.title: Function Composition in JavaScript | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the concept of function composition in JavaScript. Learn how to combine multiple functions and use the compose() function for right-to-left function composition.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, function composition, programming tutorials, coding, software development

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 中的函数组合
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中函数组合的概念。我们将学习如何组合多个函数以创建一个新函数，以及如何使用 compose() 函数来执行从右到左的函数组合。通过实际示例和练习，我们将更深入地理解这一强大技术及其在编程中的实际应用。

meta.title: JavaScript 中的函数组合 | 编程教程
meta.description: 探索 JavaScript 中函数组合的概念。学习如何组合多个函数并使用 compose() 函数进行从右到左的函数组合。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 函数组合, 编程教程, 编码, 软件开发

verify.name: 在 Zsh 历史记录中验证 Node 命令
verify.hint: 通过输入 'node' 并按 Enter 键，可以在终端/SSH 中运行 JavaScript。
